IF NOT EXISTS(select  * from sys.tables where [name] = 'PipelineLogging')
BEGIN
	CREATE TABLE PipelineLogging
	(
		Id	int PRIMARY KEY IDENTITY(1,1)
		,DataFactoryName	Varchar(1000)
		,PipelineName	Varchar(1000)
		,PipelineGroupId	Varchar(1000)
		,PipelineRunId	Varchar(1000)
		,PipelineTriggerId	Varchar(1000)
		,PipelineTriggerName	Varchar(1000)
		,PipelineTriggerTime	Varchar(1000)
		,PipelineTriggerType	Varchar(1000)
		,PipelinetriggeredByPipelineName	Varchar(1000)
		,PipelinetriggeredByPipelineRunId	Varchar(1000)
		,AddDate	Varchar(100)
	)
END

create or alter procedure [dbo].[usp_PipelineLogging]
(
@DataFactoryName	Varchar(1000)
,@PipelineName	Varchar(1000)
,@PipelineGroupId	Varchar(1000)
,@PipelineRunId	Varchar(1000)
,@PipelineTriggerId	Varchar(1000)
,@PipelineTriggerName	Varchar(1000)
,@PipelineTriggerTime	Varchar(1000)
,@PipelineTriggerType	Varchar(1000)
,@PipelinetriggeredByPipelineName	Varchar(1000)
,@PipelinetriggeredByPipelineRunId	Varchar(1000)
,@AddDate	Varchar(1000)
)
AS
BEGIN
	INSERT INTO [dbo].[PipelineLogging] (
		DataFactoryName
		,PipelineName
		,PipelineGroupId
		,PipelineRunId
		,PipelineTriggerId
		,PipelineTriggerName
		,PipelineTriggerTime
		,PipelineTriggerType
		,PipelinetriggeredByPipelineName
		,PipelinetriggeredByPipelineRunId
		,AddDate
	)
	values
	(
		@DataFactoryName
		,@PipelineName
		,@PipelineGroupId
		,@PipelineRunId
		,@PipelineTriggerId
		,@PipelineTriggerName
		,@PipelineTriggerTime
		,@PipelineTriggerType
		,@PipelinetriggeredByPipelineName
		,@PipelinetriggeredByPipelineRunId
		,@AddDate
	)
END
